title: Question
author: Name
cleaned_text: Question Can HIV tests be affected by prescription or non-prescription drugs, herbal remedies or supplements or alcohol? 13 None of these things you would cause an HIV test to give an inaccurate result because the test looks for antibodies in your immune system. Accept the good news, that like most people who actually test for HIV, you are lucky enough to have had an HIV-negative test result. If you have any physical symptoms that prompts these worries, then you should see a doctor.
